summary: This document contains various financial statements and account servicing details from Friedman, Billings, Ramsey & Co., Inc. It outlines investment activities, net capital requirements, and account protection information related to Bear Stearns Securities Corp. The document emphasizes compliance with SEC rules and provides details on account management and reporting requirements.
locations: 600 Redhook Quarter Ste B-3, St Thomas, US VI 00802
keyFacts: The document includes account servicing details for Friedman, Billings, Ramsey & Co., Inc.
It mentions net capital requirements for Bear Stearns Securities Corp. as of specific dates.
The document outlines the SEC rules regarding order execution and reporting practices.
It provides information on SIPC account protection and changes to the commercial insurer for Excess SIPC.
